full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Standing Offers - Fresh Fruits and Vegetables

### Reference Information

* Reference Number: WS4556634926-Doc4686011319
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: WS4556634926
* Publication Date: 2024-07-15

### Tender Closing Date

* Tender Closing Date and Time: 2024-08-08 14:00:00

### Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence, Correctional Service of Canada, and Fisheries and Oceans Canada, invites bidders to participate in a Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) for the procurement of Fresh Fruits and Vegetables. The tender is for the purpose of acquiring fresh produce for use in various government departments.

### Description

This RFSO supersedes and cancels previous RFSO Document 4568718389, dated 2024-07-10, with a closing date of 2024-08-08 14:00:00. The objective of this RFSO is to establish a Standing Offer for the procurement of Fresh Fruits and Vegetables, as detailed in the Annex Statement of Requirement.

### Tender Details

* Tender Status: Expired
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and others
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Regions of Delivery: Quebec (except National Capital Region)
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* End-use Entities: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Notice Information

* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Adjakly, Efoé (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: efoe.adjakly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20324801?extsite=MjAzMjQ4MDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: The formatting was changed to use headers and paragraphs for better readability. The text was also rephrased to follow standard English grammar and word choice to ensure clarity and professionalism.  Word count: 396.
